plurals.name: dialog_merge_invalid_file_message
plurals.item: Merge operation is not supported for the selected file. It may be corrupted, it may contain proprietary \"XFA extensions\" that are not part of the PDF standard, or it may contain additional files. For password protected files, you can merge them via the thumbnails view inside the viewer.

Merge operation is not supported for some of the selected files. They may be corrupted, they may contain proprietary \"XFA extensions\" that are not part of the PDF standard, or they may contain additional files. For password protected files, you can merge them via the thumbnails view inside the viewer.

resources.string: You cannot add annotations to this page! This document appears to be corrupted. Error: %s
There was a problem attaching the file. Please try again.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on an edit action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_edit_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be edited while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on a print action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_print_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be printed while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on the reflow action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_reflow_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be viewed in reflow mode while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when users clicks on a save action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_save_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be saved while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on an edit action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_search_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be searched while it is being converted.

string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on a share action while the document is in the process of being converted
string.name: cant_share_while_converting_message

resources.string: The document can not be shared while it is being converted.
Everything in Simple Reader plus file browser and more
Are you sure you want to delete all bookmarks?
Delete all annotations in the document
Delete all bookmarks in the document
You can not delete all pages in the document.
There was a problem trying to create the file.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected stamps?
Tap + to create a new custom stamp
CompleteReader is a sample app that demonstrates how to build a complete PDF viewer and editor using pdftron PDFNet SDK.
An error occurred trying to add the selected document.
An error occurred trying to create the document.
There was a problem with the selected file.
This will clear all of the files from the favorite documents list.
This will clear all of the files from the recent documents list.
This folder already exists. Please use another name.
There was a problem trying to create the folder. Please try again.
Invalid folder name. Only upper and lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores are accepted.
Are you sure you want to delete the current page?
It was not possible to delete \"%1$s\".
An error occurred trying to delete the files.
Are you sure you want to <font color=#FF0000>permanently delete</font> \"%1$s\"?
Do you want to <font color=#FF0000> delete</font> %1$d files and %2$d folders in \"%3$s\"? All files and subfolders will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to <font color=#FF0000>permanently delete</font> these files?

In the %1$s tab, your SD Card files are read only and you cannot %2$s files.

Please navigate to the SD Card tab, where %3$s has write access to your SD Card files.
On KitKat devices apps no longer have permission to write to an external SD card. %1$s
It seems like your device does not support this functionality. %1$s
This file will be opened as read-only. To modify, open it using the \"SD Card\" tab located in the side navigation drawer where %1$s has write access. %2$s.
Flattening the document will make form fields, signatures and other annotations permanent parts of the PDF, so that they cannot be modified or removed by %1$s or other standard viewing software.
Open files stored on the SD card using the \"SD Card\" tab located in the side navigation drawer. Android restricts access to files on the SD card %1$s.
Link to a page in this PDF
An error occurred trying to merge the files.
\"%1$s\" already exists at this location. Do you want to replace it with the file you\'re moving?
This file is password protected, please enter the password below.
Are you sure you want to remove access to \"%1$s\"? The folder will not be deleted.
An error occurred trying to remove \"%1$s\".
An error occurred trying to remove the folders.
Are you sure you want to remove access to these folders? The folders will not be deleted.
This file already exists. Please use another name.
There was a problem trying to rename. Please try again.
Invalid file name. Please enter a valid name.
Invalid folder name. Please enter a valid name.
In your web browser, open the menu, select Share, and choose Convert to PDF.
Select display color of this file
Open this document using the \"SD Card\" tab located in the side navigation drawer to modify this document.
Save a copy on your device to modify this document.
Please wait for download to finish
Changes made now will not be saved. Please wait for download to finish
Document closed due to download cancellation.
Are you sure you wish to download this file (%1$s) using your mobile data connection?
There was a problem trying to duplicate the file. Please try again.
There is insufficient storage space on the device. Please clear space and try again.
Maximum number of duplicated files reached. Please delete unnecessary files and try again.
This file has been damaged. %1$s tried to repair it but could not, so it cannot be opened. Sorry!
This file cannot be opened because it has no pages.
An error occurred while trying to export the document.
Failed to open folder. Please try again.
Portfolio documents cannot be added to this document.
The file contains proprietary XFA extensions and can\'t be opened.
Color has to be a hex value
Error trying to open the file.
An error occurred while trying to print the document.
There was a problem reading the text. Please try again.

The Read function is not working on your device. This is most likely due to your device\'s text-to-speech engine.

Please go to your Settings and switch to Google\'s Text-to-speech engine.

The new document has been saved with the filename:
%1$s

The attachment has been saved here:
%1$s
Error opening file: This file no longer exists.

resources.string: You have unsaved changes, want to retrieve it?
There is a problem with this image. Please try loading it again.
There was a problem inserting the image. Please try again.
There was a problem with the chosen file. Please try again.
Wrong file type. Please try again and select an image.
Unfortunately %1$s could not be converted to a PDF.
Enter measurement between the two points.

To get license key, please go to pdftron website to request trial.

Then add your license key to gradle.properties file:
PDFTRON_LICENSE_KEY=YOUR_LICENSE_KEY.

string.comment: Message shown non-pdf document is finished converting
string.name: open_universal_succeeded

resources.string: Please enter a valid page range.
Please enter a valid start number.
This document contains additional files. Do you wish to view a list of these files?

Change permissions in your device\'s settings.
Give %1$s access to Storage.
Storage permission is needed to proceed.
Permissions were not granted. Enable in settings.
When enabled, page will turn when tapping on the left or right edge of the viewer.
When enabled, the annotation list displays the annotation\'s author.
Default author name for your annotations.
Are you sure you wish to restore the default color presets?
When enabled, the annotation toolbar does not return to the hand tool after an annotation is created.
When enabled, the text of a highlight/underline/strikeout annotation is automatically copied into the annotation\'s note.
When enabled, top toolbar and side navigation drawer will be shown at all time.
When enabled, JavaScript actions embedded in PDF files will be executed.
This can take up to a couple minutes.
List of available fonts for free text annotations.
When enabled, the system bars will be hidden when viewing a document.
When enabled, some images will look better, but loading them might be a little slower.
When enabled, ink drawn with a finger is smoothed. (Stylus ink is never smoothed)
When enabled, the zoom level will not change when you turn pages horizontally.
When enabled, multiple documents will be opened in a single viewer.
When enabled, page will turn with animation when tapping on the left or right edge of the viewer.
When enabled, the page number will be shown when turning pages.
Whether the page fit screen by page width or page height
When enabled, documents opened from the Recent List are reopened on the last page they were on.
When enabled, the viewer\'s Page Display dialog includes an option to enable right-to-left document support.
When enabled, the screen will stay on as long as you are viewing a document.
When enabled, annotations with comments will display a note icon.
When enabled, the annotation will be selected after it is created with the toolbar.
When enabled, the stylus will create (and edit) annotations, and a finger will scroll and zoom the viewer.
You can change scrolling direction by clicking the [gear] button.
Do you want to switch to vertical scrolling?
Markup is not available in reflow mode.
Search is not available in reflow mode.
This document has not been cropped using the \"Crop Pages\" action, and so a cropped copy cannot be saved.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected signatures?
Tap + to create a new signature
Display and annotate documents on Android
Document has been saved and closed.
Your device\'s volume is on mute.

string.comment: When filtering files, if there are no files of the selected types, we display this message
string.name: textview_empty_because_no_files_of_selected_type

resources.string: No documents of the selected file types. (_)

string.comment: When filtering files, if no files match the string, we display this message
string.name: textview_empty_because_no_string_match

resources.string: No documents match the text filter.

No external storage folders selected.
Step 1: Click + to select a root path.
Step 2: Choose the external SD card from the drawer. 
Step 3: Confirm selection.
To favourite a document, use %1$s\'s file browser to find the document, and then tap the document\'s info
Access has not been granted to any SD-card folders
Are you sure you want to restore default colors? This action cannot be undone.
Press Ctrl+V to paste where the cursor is
Copying annotation to clipboard, please wait
Add your name as an author to annotations you create. You can change this in the Settings menu.
Flattening the annotation will make it a permanent part of the PDF, so that it cannot be modified or removed by standard viewing software. This can be undone.
This will delete the current signature. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
Are you sure you want to overwrite the current signature with a new one?
Do you want to open the page at %1$s?
Choose an image for the signature
Error while applying appearance; file not signed.
Error while applying appearance (invalid image file path); file not signed.
This field is already signed. The following is information about the signature entry:
Failed to save: file is locked for writing
You can use the space below to draw you signature, or just click the \"Pick image\" button to use an image instead.

By clicking "Sign and Save" the document will be digitally signed using a pre-existent certificate and password, and saved. If you prefer to just add the signature to the field and digitally sign it later, click \"Use Appearance\". Using just the appearance will allow you to further change the thickness and color of the signature.
Pasting annotation from clipboard, please wait
The colors you recently used will appear here
This crop box will be used for all pages. Click on %1$s to apply.
This crop box will be used for even pages. Click on %1$s to apply.
This crop box will be used for odd pages. Click on %1$s to apply.
Automatically crop each page to its content, manually crop pages, or remove all page cropping.
